title: New: Cloves – Frail Love
body:
_Frail Love_, the stunning debut from Australia’s **Cloves**, proves to be one of the finest first outings of the year.

Written and recorded with Justin Parker (Lana Del Rey, Rihanna) and Rich Cooper (Tom Odell, Mumford & Sons), lifted from a debut EP out later in the year, it’s a delicate number, almost verging into ballad territory. Check it out below.

Follow our [Spotify On Repeat playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a hand-picked selection of the current hottest tracks.
